meanings.definition: The ability to stretch or expand easily.
meanings.sent1: The rubber band's distensibility allowed it to stretch across the room.
meanings.sent2: The balloon's distensibility made it easy to blow up.
meanings.sent3: The distensibility of the marshmallow made it a fun treat to roast over the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The distensibility of the fabric resembled that of a trampoline, bouncing back effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The distensibility of the dough made it perfect for shaping into different forms.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be distended.
meanings.sent1: The distensibility of the balloon allowed it to expand when filled with air.
meanings.sent2: The distensibility of the rubber band was evident when it stretched without breaking.
meanings.sent3: The clown's pants had such distensibility that they could fit people of all sizes.
meanings.sent4: The distensibility of the sponge made it absorb water quickly.
meanings.sent5: The distensibility of the glove made it comfortable to wear for long periods.
